tool_description:
Detect text generated by OpenAI ChatGPT with high accuracy.  Our AI text generation detection tool helps users identify human-written and machine-generated text. Our tool uses 6 distinct methods to classify text with a 93% accuracy rate, based on testing a dataset of 100K+ samples. 
#GPTKit #DetectGPT #GPTZero #ZeroGPT
name: ChatGPT Detector
title: ChatGPT Detector

api_list.name: Detect
api_list.description: Detect if text is generated by ChatGPT.  We use 6 different methods (called "providers") for detection.  Each check of 2048 characters consumes one credit. For better results, please enter more than 50 words
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://chatgpt-detector.p.rapidapi.com/gpt/detect"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "chatgpt-detector.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://chatgpt-detector.p.rapidapi.com/gpt/detect"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "chatgpt-detector.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
